name: 李永瑤
objective:
先修課程：負責教授同意。自動化機械之機構、感測器與驅動器介面技術、可程式控制程式設計及應用、作實際自動化機械之模擬、分析及設計專題。
prerequisite: the permission of the instructor
subjects: mechatronic systems, mechanism of mechatronic systems, sensors, drivers and actuators, interface techniques , PLC, and case study.
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction To Control Systems 
Week 2-4: Introduction To Microprocessor-Based Control 
Week 5-8: Operational Amplifiers And Signal Conditioning 
Week 9-12: Switches, Relays And Sensors
Week 13-16:Direct current motors,Stepper motors And Alternating current motors
scorePolicy: 5 quiz, including Midterm and Final Exams
materials:
Modern Control Technology, 3rd Edition
Christopher Kilian
ISBN-10: 1401858066  
ISBN-13: 9781401858063 
672 Pages  Hardcover
consultation: Will set a line group for the class, will provide discussion and consultation in the group chat
